info.description: Participate in early attempts at Swedish nationbuilding... or do not.
info.helpText:
Players choose a seat by clicking any "click to sit" buttons, then type their name into the popup window. Sit down by clicking the green "Go" button.

After all players have chosen seats, any one player must click the "Setup" button, click the check box in the popup window, and then click the "Reset the game!" button. This will randomly determine the starting player, and place all player's hierarchy stones onto the track in the correct order.

Clicking on any chess piece will hide/reveal that pieces name.

Once done with their turn, the player should click the "Click to end turn" button above their name, which will move to the next player in order. The next player will hear a soft sound and a text alert on screen, reminding them that their turn has begun. Clicking anywhere on the screen will remove the text alert. Any players who do not want to hear the sound and/or see the text alert when it is their turn can click the "Turn Settings" button in the bottom left corner and change their preference.

Hovering your mouse over the "Rules Reference" box in the middle-left of the screen will reveal the rules reference player aid.

Coins are automatically flipped, and dice are automatically rolled, when taken from their holders.

Clicking on the King's Coin on the hierarchy track will flip it over.

Drag and drop stones from under your name to the area under an opponent's name in order to give them that stone.

Clicking on a "Reveal Stones" button, and confirming the popup box, will reveal all stones in your area to all players. These stones may be hidden by clicking that button again.

elseRoutine.header: Are you sure you want to remove ${PROPERTY player} from this seat?

fields.label: Remove this player from their seat

info_game_structure_parent.note: The overflow CSS declaration means anything larger than this widget won't be visible.

info_game_structure_asset.note: Make sure to set movable and movableInEdit to false so you can drag around the whole icon.

info_game_structure_icon.note: The pointer-events CSS declaration means it won't stand in the way of the item under it but you also can't select it by clicking on it so you have to find it in the tree. Make sure the z here is greater than the z on the item you're enlarging.

fields.label: Check this box and click the green button to reveal this player's stones.
Check this box and click the green button to reset the game.

thenRoutine.note: broke this because it isn't needed. Keeping code for the future.
